Author: pistoriusp
Content:
I read a book called "The 10 differences between the middle class and millionaires," I think the first difference the author makes is that the middle class talks about people and millionaires talk about ideas.

This has stuck with me and I generally try to avoid conversations that are about people...

Author: allenbrunson
Content: i wouldn't say it was "false" so much as "simplified."  it was "microsoft's operating system" in the sense that they owned it, had the rights to license it to ibm, and saw potential where ibm didn't.

Author: comatose_kid
Content:
After all of those proposed changes, Lisp is still just too easy to read for the elite hackers it targets.
Why not just use a CRC8 for each keyword as an identifier instead?

Author: lisper
Content: For the record, I did not submit this article, and specifically declined a request to do so.  It's not that I don't stand by what I wrote (I do) but it was written for a specific audience at a specific time and I don't think it deserves the attention that it's getting now.
